Here are a few other ideas you might consider:

1. "Unleashing the power of HR" - Use a graphic of an HR superhero or a power button to emphasize the message.
2. "Transform your work experience" - Use a graphic of a caterpillar transforming into a butterfly to show how HR can help employees grow.
3. "Welcome to the future of HR" - Use a graphic of a futuristic city or a rocket ship blasting off to emphasize the message.
4. "Unlock your potential with HR" - Use a graphic of a key or a lock to show how HR can help employees unlock their potential.
5. "Empowering employees, one HR solution at a time" - Use a graphic of a light bulb to show how HR solutions can help employees have bright ideas and work smarter.
6. "HR made easy" - Use a graphic of a simple, user-friendly interface to show how HR can make things easy for employees.
7. "Join the HR revolution" - Use a graphic of a revolution symbol or a fist raised in solidarity to show how HR can help employees work together to create positive change.

Remember to keep your message clear and concise, and use graphics and animations that are eye-catching and engaging. Good luck with your launch!
